name: U Coin
description: U-topia Ecosystem is a decentralized media platform that bridges real-world assets with digital finance, media, and entertainment through blockchain technology. At its core is $U, a multi-chain utility token that powers transactions, rewards, staking, and cross-platform engagement. Designed to be accessible to users of all ages, U-topia includes U-Wallet, a cross-chain wallet that removes the need for specific cryptocurrencies, and U-tap, a gamified micro-game platform on Telegram and Line. With Chain and Account Abstraction technology, U-topia simplifies user interactions across over 72 EVM-compatible chains, enabling frictionless engagement in media, e-commerce, and gaming while rewarding users through $U.
